Field 2A.Question: Did you stay less than 90 days?
Field 2A.Dependency Logic: If No – no other response options required; If Yes – use Field #2 response options 10, 11, 2, 3 and go to Field 2C

Field 2B.Question: Did you stay less than 7 nights?
Field 2B.Dependency Logic: If No – no other response options required; If Yes – use Field #2 response options 10, 11, and go to Field 2C

Field 2C.Question: On the night before did you stay on the streets, ES, or SH?
Field 2C.Dependency Logic: If No – no other response options required; If Yes – go to Field 3, followed by Field 4, and then Field 5

Responses.101: One month (this time is the first month)
